title: How much money did Hillary Clinton make off her book? - Quora

response.answer_text: How much money did Hillary make from her book? Which one? Her first—It Takes a Village—-was a Huge bestseller. The phrase may ring a bell. Hillary then wrote a Hugely successful autobiographical bestseller. Her last book—the one about the 2016 loss—was the least commercially successful of her books.

You’ll have to ask George Soros. I’m sure he bought up all the stacks of unsold books of hers. I read the book she and her VP running mate wrote together did not sell well at all. I can’t imagine why.
